name: Meteor Man
description:
You find yourself floating in the dark abyss of space, watching your spaceship get smaller and smaller as you gain headway. The worst part of it all is that your space dog Buddy sits trapped in the spaceship!

Get your oxygen thrusters ready, because you're in for one thrilling ride!

In this top-down 2D game, control meteor man with clicking around the screen. He will use his oxygen thrusters to thrust in that direction. Once landed on an asteroid, press space to jump off, which throws you into space! While flying, use your oxygen thrusters to direct yourself to safe places and also oxygen pills, which refill your O2 bar.

Your spaceship awaits for your return, and more importantly, so does Buddy.
